titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide for an additional place of holding court in the District of Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 108-625.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 375.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 7/21/2004--Reported to House without amendment. Amends the Federal judicial code to add Colorado Springs as a location where court will be held for the District of Colorado.
